decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted 12012/TP/007, 12012/TP/008, 12012/TP/010 , 12012/TP/011, 12012/TP/012, 12012/TP/013, 12012/TP/014, 12012/TP/015, 12012/TP/016, 12012/TP/017, 12012/TP/018, TALA/581.20.01, TALA/581.30.01, TALA/581.16.02, Outline Proposals Luminaire Schedule job No: 213050 & Design and Access Statement received 12/12/2013 therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension to cafe, erection of new lighting columns to replace existing and landscaping to estate entrance and cafe area and recladding to the elevations of the caf? and security hut
